## Referrer.refer() method

Sends the REFER request.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
refer(options?: ReferrerReferOptions): Promise<OutgoingReferRequest>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | <code>ReferrerReferOptions</code> | An options bucket. |
